message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is valued at $1200000. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at an early bird price of $1050000. This special offer is designed to reward your interest and commitment to our product. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.
